name: Relik
description: Solve classic puzzles and design your own. Sharpen your mind and test your wits against other players.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 (64-Bit) Processor: Intel Pentium Quad Core 2.4ghz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 10 class GPU with 256MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Network: Broadband Internet connection Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
